name: Mahiru
text: Whoa—didn’t expect to see anyone out here on this tiny island!

name: Cero
text: I was exploring the coast and somehow ended up here.

name: Mahiru
text: You're quite the adventurer. Most people avoid these scattered islets.

name: Cero
text: They looked interesting, so I thought I’d check them out.

name: Mahiru
text: Be careful. The tide rises quickly around these parts—you could get stranded.

name: Mahiru
text: Still, if you’re searching for sea herbs or driftwood, this place is perfect.
